flawed_nl_solution:
The truck tank has 10 gallons in it because 20 x 0.5 = <<20*0.5=10>>10
The car tank has 4 gallons in it because 12 x (1/3) = <<12*(1/3)=4>>4
She needs to add 13 gallons to the truck because 20 - 10 = <<20-10=13>>13
She needs to add 8 gallons to the car because 12 - 4 = <<12-4=8>>8
She needs to add 21 gallons in total because 13 + 8 = <<13+8=21>>21
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
